page.title: 04Modern Housing Wolverhampton
page.content: A council estate has been built in the last 30 years.The houses have front and rear gardens.There are public grass areas in front of the houses,with the original oak trees,and daffodils planted by the council.It consists of terraced and semi-detached houses,3 storey flats and retirement bungalows, garages are separate.Several people have bought their house and made improvements to it.A small area of prefabs-built in the 1940s-still exists The private housing includes semi- detached houses dating from the 1930s and modern low rise flats.Most,however, are detached houses and bungalows and have 3 or 4 bedrooms,and garages.They are built of brick and have tiled roofs.They have big gardens with lots of trees and shrubs planted around them.They are well-planned and uncrowded.
